items.text: To the chief Musician, A Psalm of David.
items.plainText: To the chief Musician, A Psalm of David.

items.text: Deliver me, O LORD, from the evil man: preserve me from the violent man;
items.plainText: Deliver me, O LORD, from the evil man: preserve me from the violent man;

items.text: Which imagine mischiefs in their heart; continually are they gathered together for war.
items.plainText: Which imagine mischiefs in their heart; continually are they gathered together for war.

items.text: They have sharpened their tongues like a serpent; adders' poison is under their lips. Selah.
items.plainText: They have sharpened their tongues like a serpent; adders' poison is under their lips. Selah.

items.text: Keep me, O LORD, from the hands of the wicked; preserve me from the violent man; who have purposed to overthrow my goings.
items.plainText: Keep me, O LORD, from the hands of the wicked; preserve me from the violent man; who have purposed to overthrow my goings.

items.text: The proud have hid a snare for me, and cords; they have spread a net by the wayside; they have set gins for me. Selah.
items.plainText: The proud have hid a snare for me, and cords; they have spread a net by the wayside; they have set gins for me. Selah.

items.text: I said unto the LORD, Thou art my God: hear the voice of my supplications, O LORD.
items.plainText: I said unto the LORD, Thou art my God: hear the voice of my supplications, O LORD.

items.text: O GOD the Lord, the strength of my salvation, thou hast covered my head in the day of battle.
items.plainText: O GOD the Lord, the strength of my salvation, thou hast covered my head in the day of battle.

items.text: Grant not, O LORD, the desires of the wicked: further not his wicked device; lest they exalt themselves. Selah.
items.plainText: Grant not, O LORD, the desires of the wicked: further not his wicked device; lest they exalt themselves. Selah.

items.text: As for the head of those that compass me about, let the mischief of their own lips cover them.
items.plainText: As for the head of those that compass me about, let the mischief of their own lips cover them.

items.text: Let burning coals fall upon them: let them be cast into the fire; into deep pits, that they rise not up again.
items.plainText: Let burning coals fall upon them: let them be cast into the fire; into deep pits, that they rise not up again.

items.text: Let not an evil speaker be established in the earth: evil shall hunt the violent man to overthrow him.
items.plainText: Let not an evil speaker be established in the earth: evil shall hunt the violent man to overthrow him.

items.text: I know that the LORD will maintain the cause of the afflicted, and the right of the poor.
items.plainText: I know that the LORD will maintain the cause of the afflicted, and the right of the poor.

items.text: Surely the righteous shall give thanks unto thy name: the upright shall dwell in thy presence.
items.plainText: Surely the righteous shall give thanks unto thy name: the upright shall dwell in thy presence.
